name: OUT OF ORDER - Episode 1 Shareware
description:
This is the shareware demo of OUT OF ORDER. (Created for So Bad Its Good Game Jam 2019)

You play as gritty, badass. ladies man FRANK MALLONE, a CyberCop on a mission to stop stop crime one rundown street at a time.

Features

  • Thrilling soundtrack by Kevin Macleod
  • Fully 3D rendered cinematic cutscenes
  • Balls-stuck-to-the-wall action
  • Fight or "Sneak" your way through missions
